meanings.definition: A countless or extremely great number
meanings.sent1: There were myriads of stars twinkling in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The beach was filled with myriads of seashells of all shapes and sizes.
meanings.sent3: Trying to count the myriads of grains of sand on the beach would take forever!
meanings.sent4: The myriads of colorful balloons at the fair created a mesmerizing sight.
meanings.sent5: The myriads of flowers in the garden painted a beautiful tapestry of colors.

meanings.sent1: There were myriads of reasons why she couldn't attend the party.
meanings.sent2: The library had myriads of books on various topics waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent3: He had myriads of excuses ready for why he didn't finish his homework.
meanings.sent4: The myriads of clouds in the sky resembled fluffy cotton candy.
meanings.sent5: The myriads of options at the ice cream shop made it hard to choose just one flavor.
